description: Maximal period of an n-stage shift register.
comments: Maximal order of an element of finite order in GL(2n, Z) or GL(2n+1, Z).a(n) is the max of the first n numbers in A080742.
references: J. Kuzmanovich and A. Pavlichenkov, Finite groups of matrices whose entries are integers, Amer. Math. Monthly, 109 (2002), 173-186.
H. Lüneburg, Galoisfelder, Kreisteilungskörper und Schieberegisterfolgen. B. I. Wissenschaftsverlag, Mannheim, 1979.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
formula: a(n) = max m such that A067240(m) <= 2n. E.g. a(2) = 12 since 12 is largest m such that A067240(m) <= 4.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_. Entry revised Mar 10, 2002.
